node.title: Invercargill police appeal to witnesses of car before serious crash
node.description: Invercargill police want to hear from anyone who saw a silver Nissan car before a high-speed crash that left three teenage boys injured early this morning.
node.content:
["Invercargill police want to hear from anyone who saw a silver Nissan car before a high-speed crash that left three teenage boys injured early this morning.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "The single-car crash happened at the intersection of Tay Street and Clyde Street about 5am.", "Two 18-year-old males were airlifted to Dunedin Hospital with critical injuries, while a 17-year-old was taken to Southland Hospital with serious injuries.", "Police ask anyone who saw a silver 2005 Nissan Bluebird in the hours before the crash to contact them.", "The Serious Crash Unit has been advised."]
